Articles.Content:
Woah, my dad's lunchbox.

The object underneath the object to your right suddenly catches on fire!

A fire brick... nice try.

The object beside the next battery you see will be the weapon that kills you.

A... rubber band. That's kinda unpleasant.

The first thing you see in the fridge becomes your new best friend.

sooo, an otter pop. lets play some... oh. you melted. WWWWWHHHHHHYYYYYYYYYY!!!

the next school debate paper you write is seen by the president and is resolved, causing you to need to write a new one. by the way, what was it about?

Well nasa got a lot more funding 

the object,under neath your computer is now alive kill it ÃŽâ€

Die, evil desk!

The object you last touched (besides your computer and anything required to use it) you should swallow whole.

The toilet... Great.

The object nearest object to you within the next 3 seconds will turn into a rubik's cube.

My trashcan needs to be solved

The next electronic device (anything that runs on electricity) will now try to take over the world.

Nice try Siri ÃŽâ€ 

your last meal will try to pepos to you ? ÃŽâ€ ÃŽâ€

Well, there goes my lunch

You next kitchen appliance you will use will demolish your house.

I never trusted sports anyway 

the next human you talk to will attempt to kiss you(back away slowly ÃŽâ€)

I'd be fine with that (you never specified vocally talking).

The next object you touch (other than your keyboard to write a response) becomes your last resource on a deserted island.

Well damn. I'll have to do with a computer mouse.

The object you last looked at (not counting anything computer/phone related) will be sent into space on the next launch.

A TV? Really?

The next kitchen appliance is now trying to brutally murder you.

Imm 404 error no kitchen object found ohhh waitkahh the knife is trying to stab me ahhhhhhhhh ÃŽâ€ 

next time you play KSP the first kerbal you kill will haunt your game

I am already haunted by the soul of Jebediah Kerman...

The next pet you touch gains the ability to speak.

-Who's a good boy?

-I'm not stupid, human. Now give me food.

The object to the left of the door in the room you're in will have to be eaten, whole.

A 6 meter by 1 meter dresser yummmm 

the object object in your poket will be the next big Pokemon

Listerine Pack, use 'Minty Breath!'

The company of the food you last ate will go out of business.
well, no more overpriced costco foods. the object to your back is now going to turn into a white whole(spits out what a black hole eats)

Wait, this game has sort of turned from "the object to your [direction]" to "the next object you [action]" for a few post.

That seems like 2 different games.

And my pillow becomes a white hole? What a fluffy white hole.

The object directly under your butt (if you are standing, whatever your butt is pointing at) is sentient.

My chair (kill it wih Fire)

the object in your right hand will now have to be used with left ÃŽâ€

Awwww, not my computer mouse!

The object to your left becomes massless.

My teddybear~ He is already light enough...

The object to your 11 o' clock direction is going to be your friend on a desert island.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-29T17:58:45Z" title="03/29/2015 05:58  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 29, 2015</time> by RainDreamer**

That'd be my second monitor. I'm going to slap my bloodied hand on it and call it Willson. It's pretty heavy though, I feel like that might *drag* our friendship down.

The object you see in the corner of your eye is now animate and very hungry. Beware.
